welcome_message_body: Welcome to Presidente Franco, Paraguay! Enjoy the charm of our city known for its beautiful landscapes, warm hospitality, and rich culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Presidente Franco has to offer.

terminals.description: This terminal handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.
